Review Text:
Resturant is in very nice location.
Tiny and cosy place.

Name: Mozo
Review Text:

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Food is amazing. A little bit overpriced!

Name: Mozo

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Amazing Moroccan restaurant! Excellent dishes, definitely one of the best restaurants I have ever been. The sweet and savoury combined with all the herbs and spices and the smell of orange blossom flower is just amazing. For starters the ‚Ä¶

Name: Mozo
Review Text: We had the loveliest time at Mozo. The restaurant is in a walking distance to AhV and when you get there you will see a cozy restaurant with a nice atmosphere. The second floor is ideal for bigger parties and perhaps having a more intimate ‚Ä¶

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Amazing starters ! One of the best hummos I have tasted of my life. Tasteful shrimps, chakhchoukha and chicken. The staff was really lovely. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mozo
Review Text: 1 of my fave restaurant in Amsterdam. If you want to try Moroccan dishes, then Mozo is the perfect restaurant üòö

Name: Mozo
Review Text: We just had a wonderful and amazing evening at MOZO. The service was great. Really polite and very helpful with information about the dishes. And the recommended food was just delicious and tasty. We had couscous and a Moroccan stew. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Nicely presented, delicious Kotelet (lamb chops with saffron rice cooked with spices) accompanied with Moroccan Cactus Fig tea in a very friendly welcoming atmosphere. Added right away to my favourite restaurants list.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: If you looking for great local Moroccans food here is the right place to go. Service could be a bit more aware of the guest but in total defiantly a place to go.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: excellent Maroccan food, served in a cosy restaurant. starters were delicious and abundant. the hummus is a must choice, no matter how many you've had before. both the veal and chicken tagine were tender and flavoursome. we arrived here for ‚Ä¶

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Went there for my moms birthday and they didn‚Äôt disappoint, friendly staff and amazing food

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Very good. Nice staff clean simple rooms. Only thing i would ask is to put brighter lights in the room.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Slightly disappointed. The menu promised do much and the reviews sounded great. But my tagine was honestly rather bland. Cooked perfectly but without much taste. And served with pretty mediocre bread (basically supermarket baguette).

Name: Mozo
Review Text: I loved the cold meze, and the hot meze were also good. Mint tea was delicious. Staff were nice and helpful.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Good vibe, really good service from staff and best Moroccan ever (being Moroccan myself, I would know). We tried different dishes and everything was absolutely delicious. Thank you and will be back soon!

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Great restaurant with outstanding service, the food was also really authentic and good.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Opened the door and was immediately greeted by the smell of fresh spices and fragrant herbs. The food took an average time to serve and gave us the opportunity to enjoy the ambience. The chicken tagine was definitely tonight's favourite and ‚Ä¶

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Went here with two of my buddies. The service is extremely warm, we had no issues in finding what we wanted. The food is good, the range of tapas is chosen well. Got a good idea about Moroccan food, we went there with no clue about what to try. There are cold and hot tapas as well.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Really nice food, true to the Maroccan recipes.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Overpriced even if the food was good, owners are not that friendly

Name: Mozo
Review Text:
This place is ‚Äúknown‚Äù as best Moroccan restaurant in Amsterdam. Well considering that other one I knew from few years ago is closed I have to take it as fact.
Atmosphere is good, service is decent and prices are acceptable. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mozo
Review Text: The price is reasonable, the service is great, the food is great, the dishes are freshly cooked almost every serving is big enough for two, unlike many other restaurant and the atmosphere is authentic with so great Morocan music in the back ‚Ä¶

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Amazing boutique restaurant. Excellent food and taste is at its best. Need to make the vegetables dish in all days beside Fridays.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: We decided to go there after reading several good reviews. We did not get disappointed. The food was tasty and fresh, including the artichokes, meat, cuscus, etc. As a real Moroccan place, no alcohol is served. The service was also very ‚Ä¶

Name: Mozo
Review Text: The food was super good, but no alcohol.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: The menu stated that the food was ‚Äútotal taste bud explosions with illegal fireworks‚Äù and my meal lived up to those expectations. I ordered the Tagine Al Andaluz with Cous Cous, and it was phenomenal. The flavors were so complementary and ‚Ä¶

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Excellent Moroccan food! I love Moroccan and Arabic food and this place is my favorite in Amsterdam. Everything you order is a delight. The tajine with meat cooked in honey and dates is pure kitchen magic. The spices are perfect. In search for Moroccan or just a really good and tasty dinner, this is your place!

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Everything we ordererd was super delicious! The place has a very oriental and chill atmosphere. Our staff ‚≠êMuhammed Hanif‚≠ê was very friendly and attentive. High recommendation üëçüèº

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Some of the best hummus I've ever had. The bread was great and the meat was extremely tender and well seasoned. We got the warm four appetizer combo and it was all very good.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Mozo was a great experience, really liked the food and ambiance. Most of all the host was kind and attentive, giving advice on the food. He made time to have a small chat, while the place was quite  packed, superb service. If you are looking for a treat, go here!

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Excellent restaurant. Small, very friendly staff, the presentation of the food is beautiful and inviting and it tastes fantastic. This is is the best Moroccan / Middle Eastern / Mediterranian restaurant so far i have visited in Amsterdam since moving here. Go for the tapas and the tagines!

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Best meal I've ever had in Amsterdam!

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Delicious food and great service. Try the "chicken pie" - a nice mixture of sweet and salty. Also the cold starter set is large for two so it might be enough for a main dish!

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Delicious food, cozy and relaxed ambience. No alcoholic beverages but a great selection of aromatic herbal infusions instead. Highly recommended, will go again!

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Delicious food! Im a regular here and that doesnt happen often. The food is so nicely spiced and the meat so tender! Super friendly staff. You dont come across many places like this, so i suggest, go try ! :)

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Interior is pretty basic, and tajines are wonderful

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Four of us went there for dinner. We all had different tajine dishes, mezze and mint tea. Everything was excellent. Nice big portions (I couldn't finish mine) and a relaxed, cozy atmosphere.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Nice staff, good food, cozy restaurant :)

Name: Mozo
Review Text: The food was delicious and the service was good, bit on the expensive side though

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Good halal option. I went for the Chicken Tagine which was delicious :)

Name: Mozo
Review Text: The flavors are absolutely incredible. Shrimp and chicken wing tapas along with hummus and eggplant made for a fantastic combination of flavors. Shrimp has quite a bit of heat.

Name: Mozo
Review Text:
Mohamed Hanif
A great and delicious experience with really nice and friendly staff! We will definitely come back again.
Eten was gewoon geweldig!!

Name: Mozo
Review Text: The veal tajines are amazing, meat is tender, soft, and very tasty. Also dessert "karmoud d'laouz" is highly recommended. Staff is smily and very welcomimg.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Good overall ambience, service and excellent food.  Their tapas are wonderful and one must taste their mutton Tajins.. the chicken Tajin is good as well.. both melt in your mouth.. dessert is mediocre.. overall a great experience.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: The food is really good. They don't serve alcohol though. Which is, I guess, for good reason, as it's Arabic, but a bit strange for a dinner place.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Delicious food and teas. Try the Arabian Nights tea for something unique. The veal tagine with dates and honey is incredible! ‚Ä¶

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Not sure what the hype about this place was.Some.dishes are good others below average .service could be a lot better .I ordered for a bottle of water that never reached the table but did show up on the bill !!! Don't see myself going back to this place

Name: Mozo
Review Text: The Tajine Al Andalus was great. This place has a good ambience. I had a lovely time eating here with my colleagues.

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Omg the food was amazing! Their lentil soup & beet salad was to die for! If I had more time there, I would go there again!

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Super great and excellent.... Tasty, cozy...

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Absolutely drop dead gorgeous food. Would spend every evening here if I could! Definitely reserve before you go.

Name: Mozo

Name: Mozo
Review Text:

Name: Mozo
Review Text: Food is really good, but service is slow. If you are seated upstairs you might have to go down to request things.
